author: Søren Bøgh Brier
description: Inspired by the Porn Star Martini, this alcohol-free cocktail, which bursts with fruitiness, is balanced rather than sweet.
name: Virgin Passion (Alcohol-free*)
recipeIngredient: 60 ml Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & cloudy

recipeInstructions.text: SCOOP the seeds and flesh of passion fruit into base of shaker
Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
